Reviews.Title: “Not the Hilton but a great clean cheap alternative.”
Reviews.Author: bri93
Reviews.Content: Stood One night here was perfect literally steps away from the beach! That's great right? We certainly were pleased. Not a good location if u were looking to go to the boardwalk being that this motel is on 71 St and the boardwalk starts on 28th and goes to 1 St. We rented scooters to get around quicker. The service was good. All in all it was great fun.

Reviews.Title: “Great and affordable place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Virgo217
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times and it's a great place for OC. Away from the busy boardwalk but not a far ride or drive when you want to head there. Clean place and the staff is nice. If you are looking for a Hilton, this isn't the place but if you are looking for a comfortable stay in a decent location, this is for you! We will continue to stay in the future.

Reviews.Title: “decent hotel for price”
Reviews.Author: crazykatesmom
Reviews.Content: Arrived 8/19 and the front desk clerk was very nice and efficient in getting everyone checked in; we arrived right at 2 PM and three people were ahead of us in line. He told us to let him know if there was anything we needed. On day four, we received a knock on the door from someone, I had never seen him before, stating he was the manager and he had complaints that we were too loud. On check out day, 8/24, the same desk clerk that checked us in, checked us out. Except for the knock on the door from whoever he was, we had a very pleasant time staying at the hotel and are already planning a return visit for next year.

Reviews.Title: “I would never recommend this place to anyway if you wanted to have a good time”
Reviews.Author: Lauren K
Reviews.Content: I felt that the Manager as well as the man that sat at the front desk (devon Washington) were extremely disrepectful and ignorant. As soon as I walked in I was threatened if we made noise and he had to come up to the room it would be ugly. Being that Ocean CIty is a PARTY town we went out and came back a little late. We werent being loud at all he called our room and said that we were walking around too much??? My boyfriend is 6ft 6 and weighs 250 there is no way he can walked lightly. He came to our door the second time and screamed and cursed at us telling us we needed to go to bed like we were little kids and then told us were are getting our stuff and leaving in the morning. The way he spoke to us females was unbelievable. That morning they were at out door at 8 am banging on the door like cops and told us we had one hr to get out (which i dont think legally ya can do) So we got our things and went to Bonita Beach hotel which was fantastic!!!! If you are looking for a nice place to stay and want to be treated like a human being and with respect, I would definitely tell you to go elsewhere. AWFUL MOTEL.....not even worth the cheap rate.....

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: poca1313
Reviews.Content: This is my second review of this motel, we stayed here two years ago and had a great stay so decided to try it again. As everyone else says, its a typical beach motel. The location is excellent, only steps from the beach. The pool was great, the rooms were clean. I'm not sure if "Lavon" was the one checking us out and in but he was very nice to us, very friendly. We were also offered towels each day. Sure it could use some updating but as long as its clean, who's sitting in the hotel looking at the furniture all day anyway? It also has a kitchenette with a full size fridge. I recommend this motel to anyone looking to stay in OC who is looking for a clean place to stay on a budget. In fact when I tell people where we stayed, I've heard more than one person say it's their favorite place to stay in OC because of price and location.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: MOwasthere
Reviews.Content: This hotel has everything you need, it's clean, it's beachside, pool, has a small kitchenette. The staff were all very friendly. I wish they had the option of queen or king sized beds... was a bit crampy trying to share a bed, but they were comfortable enough. The place did smell old, but a little fabreeze & some good cooking, the smell fades. If it had a window that opened that would help, but unfortunatly it did not. The walls are a bit thin, but I'm not a light sleeper, so it did not bother me. I will probably stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: sarah k
Reviews.Content: Just got back the other day from a stay at the beach. I was very happy with tidelands our room was nice and clean bathroom nice and clean beds nice and clean! I don't understand how any one could give a bad rating. I and my family will be visiting again very nice motel!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Beach Motel”
Reviews.Author: Camaroqueen67
Reviews.Content: Your average beach motel, nice size room, very close to the beach, and the staff were very friendly. The housekeeping staff and everyone we encountred in the office. Room was clean and rates are very reasonable. Will definetly stay here again .

Reviews.Title: “What you expect of a beach motel”
Reviews.Author: Allattitude26
Reviews.Content: Its an average beach motel the only things that stick out are the size of the rooms great size for the price. The maids are extremely friendly as well.

Reviews.Title: “Lavon is horrible!!”
Reviews.Author: AERO72
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the tides motel this past weekend for one night, (Thank god). As my friend I checked in to the motel, the night manager Lavon told us to try to keep it down during our stay, which we politely obliged. Only a few minutes later while taking our luggage up to our room, lavon yelled at us and said that we are walking on eggshells with him now, because we sound like a "Herd of elephant" walking up there. Wow! could not believe this, my friend gave me this look and said we cant put up with this already, so I ventured down to his office and asked for another room since this one was directly above his office. He proceded to tell me that there were no other rooms available, and that we shouldn't be doing alot of walking around the room anyway since it was so small, and that he likes renting it out to elderly people because they don't move around as much.He went on a rant for awhile saying that he works more than 16 hrs a day and that he will not put up with alot of noise. I told him that I read some reviews about him on trip advisor but rented anyway with an open mind, but I can now see the reviews by other people were spot on, this guy is on a power trip. When I told him that, he responded by saying him and the owner of the tides motel do not care about those reviews because they do not mean anything anyway! So since I got there late I just figured I would ride the storm out and check out as early as possible. I felt like a little kid in the room tip toeing around the room trying not to upset big daddy Lavon. It was the worst stay i've ever had anywhere in ocean city, and I have been going every year since i was 10, so 30 yrs! Checking out of the tides felt like freedom, I had so much anxiety staying there because of lavon. Never will I stay here again, or recommend this place as long as lavon is manager!!

Reviews.Title: “Disrepectful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Lisa4621
Reviews.Content: I requested new towels on my second day of my stay by walking into the office with my four towels from the previous day. I was impolitely told by the General Manager that I was only allowed to be given three towels. Three towels may sufficient to dry our bodies but my children needed a towel to stand on as the exited the shower. We would not have needed the towel to stand on if the showers were able to drain properly. There was no way to dry off in the shower due to the fact that there was standing water. Subsequently, I spoke to another family of four that were staying at the Motel and they explained that they had received five towels early that day from the office. I went back in to the office to speak with the General Manager about the matter and to obtain washrags and the General Manager became irate and threatened to evict me from the Motel. DO NOT STAY HERE

Reviews.Title: “Great motel!”
Reviews.Author: Nevaeh M
Reviews.Content: The Tides motel was very good. Reading the reviews I was kind of wish-washy about it, but when I got there the man at the front desk was very helpful! He was extremely nice and made sure we were comfortable. Though, he warned us about the manager who works at night he said "don't draw any attention to yourselves". In the other reviews I read, people said that he was a pain in the butt, but we heard no yelling, he didnt say anything to us which was good. It was steps away from the beach. But very far from the boardwalk which we had to drive to. The motel room smelled like slight mildew, nothing too strong though. Overall, it was a VERY nice motel and great staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good view of the vws but Lavon....whoa”
Reviews.Author: mk2support
Reviews.Content: Its a $100 a night motel so you can't expect too much as far as the rooms and ammenities. What really makes your stay special is the night manager. Wow. He is a special guy. When I finally got here to check in after a horrible drive I was told by Lavon that there might be a problem with my room. Thinking the worst I ask what the problem is and was told that the people above were loud. These volkswagon people he tells me, its worse than senior week. Huh. I am here for the VWs and my husband is coming along in our mk2. I guess he did not hear me because he right on ranting about how loud these people are. Saw some great cars and made some good friends, but I don't think we will stay here next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: 1958biker
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week during bike week Sept. 2011 it was our 7th time there. Obviously, if you are looking to get a 5 star hotel for this price you will be disappointed. But this hotel is great for the price. The rooms were clean and the maid staff were always friendly and made sure we had everything we needed. The managers were always friendly and proffesional and went out of their way to make sure we felt welcome and that we enjoyed the stay. You are only minutes from the beach and there are plenty of great resturants within walking distance. The manager that every is complaining about here was very nice to us and even when we did get a little loud late at night he came out and asked us nicely to quiet down or take it inside. When we were stuck in the rain and needed help,he went well out of his way to see that we were taken care of. We will definitely continue to stay at the Tides whenever we come to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Motel Oceanblock Side, Clean, Affordable and nice”
Reviews.Author: beachgrle1
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here at the Tides Motel, and I must say I had no problems with the apparent reviews I read prior about the manager constantly yelling at people or telling people to leave if they were making to much noise. I have not seen or heard anyone yelling and I did not see or hear no manager come out and yell at anyone while I was staying here. The room I stayed in was roomy, and the motel is a bit older looking but if your not picky its a place to be that is ocean block. the bathroom was clean, beds and floor were clean. The kitchen had a full size frig and a sink a mini stove. Also it provided pots and pans. the pool was very clean and nice. I will go back. Check In was a breeze no problems at all

Reviews.Title: “we will go back”
Reviews.Author: chrisntracy09
Reviews.Content: I never stayed in ocean city maryland so i found tides hotel at the last minute well let me say if you are going on vacation to stay in ur room not the place for you, this was a old hotel but for the price you cant beat it, It was very very clean the shower had excellent hot water and the water pressure in the shower was like u are being power washed, the kitchen we didnt use but nice if you have kids and wanna take ur own food, Pool is little but from my knowledge u go to the ocean to go to the beach not to stay at the pool, but when we went it was never full, i would stay at the tides motel again, Management very nice, oh and one more thing u can here whats going on in the room next to you but turn the air conditioner on high and its all good!!!! Nice place

Reviews.Title: “Don't Mess with Levon!!”
Reviews.Author: jerryfauls
Reviews.Content: The rooms were basically what you would expect for the price. Everything is old, but perfectly clean. Just make sure a friend doesn't come and visit you or Levon will come and get you!!!! He is insane and on a power trip. If you can avoid him, everyone else there was very nice. It was a good value for ocean side property. If it wasn't for Levon, we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay with family.”
Reviews.Author: annieWorthington_Wv
Reviews.Content: We read reviews and were a little wary about this place. Were we ever surprised! It was extremely clean and the staff was absolutely wonderful. Everyday housekeeping asked if we needed cleaning or anything else. The pool was very clean and well kept. No noisy or rowdy neighbors in the building. Great water pressure in the shower too. Nothing bad about our stay here at all. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Dont stay in the room right next to the rental office!”
Reviews.Author: rsavoy
Reviews.Content: My families first stay was in June 2011, on the second floor, Not to bad you can hear noise from up stairs nothing you cant live with, Our Families second stay was the first week in August 2011, room 102 right next to the rental office. This was a very different experience. We were woken up at 1:00am by the manager yelling at the TOP OF HIS LUNGS for an hour, putting someone out for being to loud! (How ironic). It happened again the next night at 11pm. I thought there was going to be a physical altercation. It sounded as if they were right in our room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel ~ Rude/Arrogant Management”
Reviews.Author: queitplease
Reviews.Content: Within 45 minutes of checkin I received a call in our room from the office with an irrrate manager literally screaming in the background that we were making too much noise...my 17 yr. old son, husband and I were unloading vehicle to our 2nd floor room (no elevator). Night #2 around 6 pm my husband and I were sitting on our bed deciding where to eat and the phone rang....The manager "DEVON" was yelling at my husband about us making too much noise!!!! My husband tried to reason with this manager but was in disbelief when he was told to walk quieter....stress & anxiety was our experience staying at Tides Motel because of the manager. We will NEVER recommend or visit this place again.

Reviews.Title: “It was a really refreshing stay”
Reviews.Author: slaptop38
Reviews.Content: I felt welcomed when we got there and throughout the stay. The room service was really warm and caring. People that are giving this place a bad review I just dont understand it. The internet service did need some help though. The housekeepers were very friendly and helpful. When we wanted to stay another night. It was done very promptly and without any problems. THANK you all from us for a very wonderful calm stay. We will be back to see you all in 2011. Oh, By the way, all of our wishes that we needed was given promptly and without a problem. Thank you all again Harrisburg,Pa

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: matthewedward
Reviews.Content: This is not a Marriott or Hilton but with the price they charge what would you expect? Honestly, the place was clean and is perfect if you do not intend to stay much in the room. I don't go to the beach to hang out in the motel...but if you do this place isn't for you. Everything is quite old and in desperate need of renovation. Smoking is not allowed in the rooms so the majority of the renters were hanging outside on the cheap chairs smoking...and in some cases drinking. It was laughable. Also, they claimed to offer free wifi but none of our 3 devices worked. They claimed it was us but there was no way that all 3 of our devices didn't work at the same time. Stay here to save money only. Don't expect luxury, quality or service.

Reviews.Title: “would not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: camel42
Reviews.Content: recently stayed here. The room was nice, small pool, very good maid service,but the floors are super thin and you can hear every footstep above you. One group of young adults above us actually had our ceiling vibrating because of their jumping up and down. We were on the second floor and had shower water from their third floor room come through the ceiling into our bathroom twice! very unsanitary. The staff wiped the floor with towels but it was still a gross unsanitary experience. Received calls continuously from one office employee who said he couldn't sleep at night in the office because the children were making to much noise with their feet on the super thin floors. The beach at this location was very treacherous for young children. Definately not worth the reduced price for what you have to endure.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad”
Reviews.Author: poca1313
Reviews.Content: These people expect quite alot for one of the cheapest hotels in Ocean City. We have stayed in some of the other cheapest and this motel is by far better then most. Yes the furniture and bathrooms are outdated and yes the pool was very small, but the room was clean, there was no bugs (we've had ants in other cheap rooms in OC), there was no foul smell (we've had that as well in other rooms) the location is perfect, a few steps from the beach , we were supplied with towels daily and there was a kitchenette with a full size refrigerator which is very cool for a room that cheap. There was a small coffee maker, they supplied dishes and utensils (which we didn't use), dish soap and rags. We even decided to stay an extra day which they accomodated. For rates in July, this motel was the second to cheapest we could find. I forgot to take a pic of the room but I did get a pic of our view from the 3rd floor.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: ChowHoundSkip
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night while attending the American Legion's Department of Maryland Convention. My advanced reservation listed, but didn't guarantee, a second floor room in the main building. I was assigned a ground floor room in the annex building at check-in. There were several "vacancy" signs at some of the chain motels, so I'm sure I could have found a more modern one for the same amount of money or slightly more. The website pictures don't show the outdated bathroom and fixtures. My bathroom was a green color with very old fixutures, including a slightly rocking toilet. There was only a small shelf space above the non-vanity sink for holding toilet articles. The mattress was fair. The check-in gentleman was very friendly, but the check-out man wasn't too friendy. I was gone during the day, so never used the pool or saw any of the cleaning staff. I would never stay there again. I am normally easy to please and not a complainer, but I was very disappointed with the old motel room. My only positive comment is: "it was a place to sleep and shower, for one night."

Reviews.Title: “A+ Great job”
Reviews.Author: Mariofan35
Reviews.Content: Tides Motel was a very nice place to relax. The staff there was nice and kind. The Tides was just a short walk from the beach, and there was no people or crowds there. It gave easy access to many restraunt like Bagels N' Buns USA which was right across the street. And my most favorite restaurant, the Bonfire. I recommend everyone to go to the Tides. I'm going again this year!

Reviews.Title: “pretty good for the price.”
Reviews.Author: elloohvee
Reviews.Content: me, my fiancee, and my parents went to virginia beach in september, and we didn't want to go back home to PA so we decided to extend our trip up to ocean city. first we stayed at a motel for one night, i can't remember what it was called, but it kind of reminded me of the motel room on the movie vacancy. really creepy. the next 2 nights we stayed at the tides motel. its a decent sized room, especially considered to the room we stayed in the night before. the room was clean and smelled clean (i dont know what these other reviewers are talking about) we were outside on the balcony and at the pool most of the time and everytime we went outside and the maids were around they asked if we needed anything. the rooms are pretty cheap. i think we only paid $160 for 2 nights with 4 people in one room. only thing that sucked was that the pool isn't heated. but its a motel so what do you expect? but its was freezing because it was really cold the few days before we arrived so that wasn't their fault.

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING!!!”
Reviews.Author: ttoman
Reviews.Content: DO NOT,I repeat, DO NOT ever stay here! What these people are doing is fraud. Online, their motel looks decent and doable, we thought, "how bad could it really be?" Well, we answered our own question. When we got there, the pool was small but that wasnt a problem. We checked in, got to our room and it smelled like mold and must. So we opened the window. As we looked over our room, we found mold on the walls, in the bathtub, on the floor, in the fridge, and in the cupboards. In the bathroom, there were pubes, yes pubic hair people! in the toilet. If that wasnt bad enough, under the blanket on the bed, the sheets were stained and there was human hair all over the pillows and sheets. Not to mention the dirty, used, snotty tissues on the floor. It also looked as if a vacuum was never used! I think you get the picture. we will NEVER stay there ever, and didnt stay for even 10 min.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: internettravelwatch
Reviews.Content: When we arrived it seemed like a clean room. After 5 days it wasn't. I thought motels cleaned your room daily. Maybe I,m mistaken but twice I had to ask for clean towels and toilet paper over the 5 nights we were there. We never saw a vacuum cleaner or any signs of one in our room. Outside was well kept amd clean. One night I called the desk for towels and was asked if I left my maid tag hang on the door, I told him it was hanging there since 11:30 AM and it was 6:00 PM. Why do I have to ask for maid service.... The staff was very friendly but I think they could do a lot more when it comes to the rooms.. The pool is small but adequate for the motel.. Its always clean and lots of chairs.. The noise, now thats a whole other problem.. the second night someone was beating on the door next to us and cursing . The next two nights the other neighbors thought that they could fight curse and swear untill 4:30 AM out on the balcony.. Not a very restful place. The annex building was the same as above as we had relatives in that building..The beach was only a 2 minute walk at most not bad..

HotelInfo.Name: Tides Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 7100 Coastal Hwy, Ocean City, MD 21842
